Contradict fact: The claim does not contradict any facts.
Exaggerate: The claim does not contain any exaggerations.
Understate: The claim does not understate anything.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at any point.
Lack enough support: The claim does not lack support.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not make any assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations.
